bug.summary: TrainModel class has an incorrectly named variable - prevents loading a model checkpoint.
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/FunctionLab/selene/blob/master/selene_sdk/train_model.py#L203>self.max_step</denchmark-link> should be . I will fix this in an upcoming PR.
